arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Monaco 2-2 OGC Nice: Ansu Fati and Sofiane Diop net braces in entertaining Côte d’Azur derby
arts.sum: Ligue 1 McDonald’s, Matchday 7, 05/10/25 AS Monaco and OGC Nice played out an entertaining 2-2 draw at the Stade Louis II, with Ansu Fati and Sofiane Diop netting braces…

arts.ttl: OGC Nice predicted XI v Monaco: Dante out, Hicham Boudaoui in the squad
arts.sum: Whilst club captain Dante continues to struggle with knee issues, Hicham Boudaoui is expected to return to the matchday squad as OGC Nice take on AS Monaco in the Côte…

arts.ttl: Monaco predicted XI v OGC Nice: Vanderson and Thilo Kehrer out
arts.sum: AS Monaco have limited options as they prepare to welcome OGC Nice in the Côte d’Azur derby on Sunday afternoon. Another name was added to the Principality club’s injury list…
